## ğŸ”§ Main Function: rtoqmd()

### Basic Syntax

```r
rtoqmd(
  input_file,           # Source R file
  output_file = NULL,   # Output .qmd file (auto if NULL)
  title = NULL,         # Document title
  author = NULL,        # Author
  format = "html",      # Output format
  theme = "cosmo",      # Quarto theme
  render = TRUE,        # Generate HTML?
  open_html = TRUE      # Auto-open HTML?
)
```

---

## ğŸ”§ rtoqmd() Parameters

### Basic Parameters

::: {.incremental}
- **input_file**: Source R script path
- **output_file**: .qmd filename (default: same name)
- **title**: YAML header title (from metadata or filename)
- **author**: Author (from metadata)
- **format**: "html", "pdf", "docx"... (default: "html")
:::

---

## ğŸ”§ rtoqmd() Parameters (continued)

### Customization Parameters

::: {.incremental}
- **theme**: From 25+ Quarto themes (default: "cosmo")
- **number_sections**: Number sections? (default: FALSE)
- **toc**: Include table of contents? (default: TRUE)
- **toc_title**: TOC title (default: "Table of contents")
- **toc_depth**: TOC depth (default: 3)
:::

---

## ğŸ”§ rtoqmd() Parameters (continued)

### Output Parameters

::: {.incremental}
- **render**: Generate HTML? (default: TRUE)
- **output_html_file**: Output HTML filename
- **open_html**: Open HTML in browser? (default: TRUE)
- **use_styler**: Show formatting suggestions (default: FALSE)
- **use_lintr**: Show quality issues (default: FALSE)
- **apply_styler**: Apply formatting directly âš ï¸ (default: FALSE)
:::

---
